article: the beer : deep space , half acre beer co. . what it is : a seasonal double ipa from half acre that 's among my very favorite beers made in chicago . deep space is a gloriously fruity-bitter-boozy hop bomb that 's impossibly easy to drink . it 's the rare half acre ipa featuring darker malt in the mash , which leads to a sweeter , bready character , thicker mouthfeel and a darker hue amid the flood of juicy the can : dank sticky fruit -- mango , apricot , papaya -- leap out in the aroma , tempered by notes of pine , caramel and a touch of bread pudding .

deep space offers robust fruitiness -- the same mango , apricot and papaya with a touch of grapefruit rind -- in a viscous body and tempered by a lingering earthy , bitter finish . deep space is bold , balanced and : 10 percentfind it : available on tap and in 16-ounce cans at both half acre taprooms through december . also sold throughout the chicago area on draft and in cans at better bars and beer stores .
abstract: beer of the month : deep space goes deep as fruity , balanced double ipa
